Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Interpol did not release a report about cybercrimes in Kenya or identify Juja as a hotspot.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a satirical website article and not on any official report from Interpol.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Interpol released a report on Kenya cybercrimes hotspots, which is not true.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the claim originated from a satirical website and was not based on any official information from Interpol.
